about_the_game:
Wing Haven is a relaxing idle game about building cozy bird sanctuaries. Progress from a basic enclosure to a beautiful nature preserve in old-growth forest, desert oasis, or wetland climates!

Collect rare and exotic feathered friends and watch them grow in real-time! Open bird "packs" with over 75 unique bird species in common, rare, epic and legendary varieties, with exciting rare color variants!

Enhance your ecosystem with native plants that boost your birds growth and earnings!
detailed_description:
Wing Haven is a relaxing idle game about building cozy bird sanctuaries. Progress from a basic enclosure to a beautiful nature preserve in old-growth forest, desert oasis, or wetland climates!

Collect rare and exotic feathered friends and watch them grow in real-time! Open bird "packs" with over 75 unique bird species in common, rare, epic and legendary varieties, with exciting rare color variants!

Enhance your ecosystem with native plants that boost your birds growth and earnings!
name: Wing Haven

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Wing Haven is a relaxing idle game about building cozy bird sanctuaries. Collect rare and exotic feathered friends, give them plant shelter, and watch them grow in real-time! Progress from a basic enclosure to a beautiful nature preserve in old-growth forest, desert oasis, or wetland climates!
